name: Ayesha Rahman
story: Through SkillSwap, I started teaching design for the first time. Now I work as a freelance designer, earn regularly, and help new learners develop their skills.

name: Tanvir Hossain
story: Teaching guitar has always been my passion, but I never had the right platform. SkillSwap gave me the opportunity to share my talent and connect with amazing students.

name: Rafiq Ahmed
story: I used to be nervous speaking English, but a mentor I met on SkillSwap helped me gain confidence. Now I guide other learners to improve their communication skills.

name: Nusrat Jahan
story: SkillSwap helped me share my web development knowledge with others. Today I host online coding classes and have started building my own freelance projects.
